text: The following lists events that happened in 1927 in the Imperial State of Persia. ==Incumbents== * Shah: Reza Shah * Prime Minister: Mostowfi ol-Mamalek (until June 2), Mehdi Qoli Hedayat (starting June 2) ==Events== ==Births== *date unknown – Bijan Jalali, poet (died 2000) ==Deaths== * December 26 – Abolqasem Naser ol-Molk, 5th Prime Minister of Iran and former Regent (born 1856) ==References== Category:1920s in Iran Category:Years of the 20th century in Iran Persia Persia
title: 1927 in Persia
